representation_information.name: Module Music Formats (Mods)
representation_information.description: A group of digital music file types produced by a variety of software applications called trackers. Mod files include sequencing information (similar to MIDI_SD) and waveform samples (generally PCM audio), and may be compared to XMF files.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
